m2mimud.state
Interface MobListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameSystem
public interface MobListener

The moblistener is an object which is notifed when a mob moves, respawns, or attacks its targets.

Method Summary
 void attackTarget(int damage, java.lang.String name)
          Tells the listener that the mob is attacking its target
 void moveMob(MobMove theMove)
          Informs the listener that the mob needs to move
 void respawnMob(MobKey key)
          Informs the listener that the mob has respawned.
 

Method Detail

                  java.lang.String name)

Parameters:

Informs the listener that the mob has respawned.
